mapper.insert: INSERT INTO step (title, description, code, layer, file_index, sort_order) VALUES (#{title}, #{description}, #{code}, #{layer}, #{fileIndex}, #{sortOrder})
mapper.update: UPDATE step SET title=#{title}, description=#{description}, code=#{code}, layer=#{layer}, file_index=#{fileIndex}, sort_order=#{sortOrder} WHERE id=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT id, title, description, code, layer, file_index, sort_order FROM step WHERE id=#{id}
SELECT id, title, description, code, layer, file_index, sort_order FROM step ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT id, title, description, code, layer, file_index, sort_order FROM step WHERE user_id=#{userId}
